verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמִּשְׁכָּ֥ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh Moreover thou shalt make עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> 'E-ser [with] ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot; curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <WH7806> ma-she-Zar, [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> u-te-Che-let and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <WH8144> sha-Ni, and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <WH3742> ke-ru-Vim [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> cho-Shev of cunning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

אֹ֣רֶךְ׀ <WH753> 'O-rech The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <WH259> ha-'a-Chat, of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh [shall be] eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat; of one מִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> mid-Dah measure אַחַ֖ת <WH259> 'a-Chat shall have one לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ot. and every one of the curtains

חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh The five הַיְרִיעֹ֗ת <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ot, curtains תִּֽהְיֶ֙יןָ֙ <WH1961> tih-Yei-na become חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <WH2266> choe-Rot, shall be coupled together אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah; to another וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and [other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot curtains חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <WH2266> choe-Rot, [shall be] coupled אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah. to another

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <WH3924> lul-'Ot loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let, of blue עַ֣ל <WH5921> 'al on שְׂפַ֤ת <WH8193> se-Fat upon the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat, of the one מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> mik-ka-Tzah from the selvedge בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <WH2279> ba-cho-Va-ret; in the coupling וְכֵ֤ן <WH3651> ve-Chen and likewise תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh and likewise shalt thou make בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> bis-Fat edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah, of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH7020> hak-Ki-tzo-Nah, in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <WH4225> bam-mach-Be-ret in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Nit. of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim Fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> lu-la-'Ot, loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> bay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <WH259> ha-'e-Chat in the one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> lu-la-'Ot, loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> bik-Tzeh in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah, of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <WH4225> bam-mach-Be-ret that [is] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit; of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <WH6901> mak-bi-Lot may take hold הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <WH3924> hal-Lu-la-'Ot, that the loops אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah. of another

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <WH7165> kar-Sei taches זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; of gold וְחִבַּרְתָּ֨ <WH2266> ve-chib-bar-Ta and couple אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיְרִיעֹ֜ת <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ot the curtains אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah to one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲחֹתָהּ֙ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah with בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <WH7165> bak-ke-ra-Sim, the taches וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. and it shall be one פ Peh

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make יְרִיעֹ֣ת <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot curtains עִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim, [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> le-'O-hel [hair] to be a covering עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan; upon the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּי־ <WH6249> 'ash-tei- eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot curtains תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

אֹ֣רֶךְ׀ <WH753> 'O-rech The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <WH259> ha-'a-Chat, of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <WH7970> she-lo-Shim [shall be] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat; of one מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> mid-Dah measure אַחַ֔ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, [shall be all] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH6249> le-'ash-Tei eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot. curtains

וְחִבַּרְתָּ֞ <WH2266> ve-chib-bar-Ta And thou shalt couple אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh five הַיְרִיעֹת֙ <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ot curtains לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, themselves וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ot curtains לְבָ֑ד <WH905> le-Vad; themselves וְכָפַלְתָּ֙ <WH3717> ve-cha-fal-Ta by themselves and shalt double אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔ית <WH8345> hash-shish-Shit, the sixth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מ֖וּל <WH4136> mul against פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei the front הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> ha-'O-hel. of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> lu-la-'Ot, loops עַ֣ל <WH5921> 'al on שְׂפַ֤ת <WH8193> se-Fat on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat, of the one הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <WH7020> hak-ki-tzo-Nah [that is] outmost בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <WH2279> ba-cho-Va-ret; in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> lu-la-'Ot, loops עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> se-Fat in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah, of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <WH2279> ha-cho-Ve-ret which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Nit. the second

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make קַרְסֵ֥י <WH7165> kar-Sei taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet of brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim; fifty וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ta and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקְּרָסִים֙ <WH7165> hak-ke-ra-Sim the taches בַּלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <WH3924> bal-Lu-la-'Ot, into the loops וְחִבַּרְתָּ֥ <WH2266> ve-chib-bar-Ta and couple אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel the tent וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will be a אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. together that it may be one

וְסֶ֙רַח֙ <WH5629> ve-Se-rach And the remnant הָעֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> ha-'o-Def, that remaineth בִּירִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> bi-ri-'Ot of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel; of the tent חֲצִ֤י <WH2677> cha-Tzi the half הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָעֹדֶ֔פֶת <WH5736> ha-'o-De-fet, that remaineth תִּסְרַ֕ח <WH5628> tis-Rach shall hang עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al over אֲחֹרֵ֥י <WH268> 'a-cho-Rei over the backside הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan. of the tabernacle

וְהָאַמָּ֨ה <WH520> ve-ha-'am-Mah And a cubit מִזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh on the one side וְהָאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> ve-ha-'am-Mah and a cubit מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> miz-Zeh side בָּעֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> ba-'o-Def, on the other side of that which remaineth בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> be-'O-rech in the length יְרִיעֹ֣ת <WH3407> ye-ri-'Ot of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel; of the tent יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become סָר֜וּחַ <WH5628> sa-Ru-ach it shall hang עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over צִדֵּ֧י <WH6654> tzid-Dei over the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh the other וּמִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> u-miz-Zeh one לְכַסֹּתֽוֹ׃ <WH3680> le-chas-so-To. on this side and on that side to cover

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make מִכְסֶה֙ <WH4372> mich-Seh a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> la-'O-hel, for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> 'o-Rot skins אֵילִ֖ם <WH352> 'ei-Lim [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <WH119> me-'ad-da-Mim; dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <WH4372> u-mich-Seh and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> 'o-Rot skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> te-cha-Shim [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah. above פ Peh

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> hak-ke-ra-Shim boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> lam-mish-Kan; for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <WH7848> shit-Tim [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <WH5975> 'o-me-Dim. standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> 'E-ser Ten אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech [shall be] the length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ka-resh; of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <WH520> ve-'am-Mah and a cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ha-'am-Mah, cubits רֹ֖חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav [shall be] the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad. of one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei Two יָד֗וֹת <WH3027> ya-Dot, tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH7175> lak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, [shall there be] in one מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <WH7947> me-shul-la-Vot, set in order אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah; against another כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken thus תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh, thus shalt thou make לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <WH7175> kar-Shei for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan. of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> hak-ke-ra-Shim the boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> lam-mish-Kan; for the tabernacle עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty קֶ֔רֶשׁ <WH7175> Ke-resh, boards לִפְאַ֖ת <WH6285> lif-'At side נֶ֥גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah on the south תֵימָֽנָה׃ <WH8486> tei-Ma-nah. southward

וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im forty אַדְנֵי־ <WH134> 'ad-nei- sockets כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> Che-sef, of silver תַּעֲשֶׂ֕ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh And thou shalt make תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim under the twenty הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ka-resh; boards שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> she-Nei two אֲדָנִ֜ים <WH134> 'a-da-Nim sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under הַקֶּ֤רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָד֙ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad under one לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> lish-Tei for his two יְדֹתָ֔יו <WH3027> ye-do-Tav, tenons וּשְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> u-she-Nei and two אֲדָנִ֛ים <WH134> 'a-da-Nim sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad under another לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> lish-Tei for his two יְדֹתָֽיו׃ <WH3027> ye-do-Tav. tenons

וּלְצֶ֧לַע <WH6763> u-le-Tze-la' side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit And for the second לִפְאַ֣ת <WH6285> lif-'At side צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon; on the north עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [there shall be] twenty קָֽרֶשׁ׃ <WH7175> Ka-resh. boards

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im And their forty אַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> 'ad-nei-Hem sockets כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> Ka-sef; [of] silver שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei two אֲדָנִ֗ים <WH134> 'a-da-Nim, sockets תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ke-resh board הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> u-she-Nei and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <WH134> 'a-da-Nim, sockets תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> hak-Ke-resh board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad. under another
